nodes.text: Unidentified captain of the Band Light

A captain was in command of the vessel Band Light, which was suspected of privateering during the reign of the Galactic Empire. The captain and the rest of the crew came across a derelict Etti-class light transport near the planet Ord Mantell at some point before or during 1 BBY. They were happy to find it at first, but after investigating the ship for a while, three of the Band Light's crew mysteriously died. The captain pulled everyone off of the light transport, but the Band Light began having problems. The captain initially thought that the deaths and strange occurrences on the Band Light were just accidents, but they were in truth caused by an Imperial Terror Trooper.

The captain of the Band Light was first mentioned in the "Terror Trooper" entry in the in-game databank of the PlayStation 3/Xbox 360 versions of the LucasArts video game Star Wars: The Force Unleashed II, which was released in 2010.
